import React, {Component} from 'react' import {login} from '../index.js' export class LoginPage extends Component { state = { visibility: "hidden" } switchAccess(){ if (this.state.visibility === "hidden") this.state.visibility = "visible" else this.state.visibility = "hidden" } render(){ return ( <>
LoginPage
